forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. West northwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the night deepens over Downtown San Francisco, the city rests beneath a shroud of clouds, hinting at the cool embrace of an approaching evening. With temperatures hovering around 47 degrees, the light breeze from the west-northwest carries the promise of a refreshing chill. The skyline is partially obscured, lending an ethereal quality to the views, as visibility dips ever so slightly into the twilight, softening the edges of the iconic landmarks. Fog has yet to lay its blanket upon the city; instead, it remains a distant specter to the north—an inevitability yet to unfold.

Looking ahead to Saturday, the dawn will break into a serene tableau, as sunshine bathes the streets, engulfing them in warmth that might reach a high of 56. As midday approaches, one may notice the temperatures gently receding, cradling moments of tranquility perfect for leisurely strolls or quiet moments in a local café with a warm drink in hand. Attire should lean toward layers—consider a light jacket or cardigan to embrace the shifting temperatures with grace. Perhaps, with the day’s inviting clarity, a visit to a nearby park or exploration of cherished hidden alleys might invoke that sweet sense of adventure that the city so effortlessly provides.
